articles.author: Soumil Kamat
articles.title: Over Rs 8 Lakh Debited From Account: CEO Receives Phishing Email From THIS Bank-Here's What Happened
articles.description: Ashish Ranjan Maurya, CEO of KitabKopy.com, took to LinkedIn to share an experience with online phishing scams after receiving an email stating his account had been debited for Rs. 8,39,239 after a cheque purportedly issued by him had been cleared.
